sentences.sentence: A live parasitic roundworm has been pulled out of a woman's brain in Australia while it was still wriggling.

sentences.speaker: SPEAKER_05
sentences.sentence: This stomach-churning discovery was the first time a worm of this type has been discovered in any mammal, including humans, as they are usually found in the brains of snakes. was the first time a worm of this type has been discovered in any mammal, including humans, as they're usually found in the brains of snakes.
